TopicTitle: What are your experiences with the Kraken?

Articles.Content:
I wanna hear your experience with the Kraken, and how it happened!

 

I'll go first.

One time, I accidentally smashed Jeb into Minmus.

I reloaded a quicksave, and noticed I couldn't turn.

Turns out an un-documented Kraken (now named censor kraken) attacked my game and corrupted it.
